thread.title: City wages war on invading water hyacinth (Shanghai Municipal Government)
thread.title_full: City wages war on invading water hyacinth (Shanghai Municipal Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: City wages war on invading water hyacinth (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Suzhou Creek which runs through downtown Shanghai and joins the Huangpu River at the Bund is plagued by the biggest invasion of water hyacinth in recent years. Authorities sent more workers to remove
